釀.definition: to ferment; to brew; to make honey (of bees); to lead to; to form gradually; wine; stuffed vegetables (cooking method)

釀成.definition: to make (wine or spirits); (fig.) to lead to (a bad result)

釀製.definition: to brew (beer, soy sauce etc); to make (wine, vinegar etc); to distill (spirits)

釀造.definition: to brew; to make (wine, vinegar, soybean paste etc) by fermentation

釀酒.definition: to make a fermented drink (i.e. to brew beer, make wine etc)

釀酶.definition: zymase (enzyme in yeast involved in fermentation)
